title: The Flower Blooms
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Hanayo, try this one. This shumai has Japanese rice sprinkled around it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>*Munch*.... Hnn~, it’s so good! The combination of rice and shumai is the best~. So, what were you saying earlier?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ah, that’s right. After that, Lanzhu happened to see Nijigaku sing at the center stage. Lanzhu still remembers the shock Lanzhu got from that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I know right~~!? I also remember the first time I saw school idols too! I was instantly entranced by them. I couldn’t move even after the live was over. And when I got home they were all I could think about.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So you do get it! Yeah, Lanzhu couldn’t forget that performance even after Lanzhu went back to Hong Kong, so Lanzhu kept watching their videos online.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Mhmm, that’s right. I also watch a ton of their videos.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It made me love Nijigaku even more and got me thinking that I had to go to Nijigaku. Lanzhu thought that those girls are going to be my friends!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m also a friend of yours now, right, Lanzhu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Of course, Hanayo! Lanzhu loves everyone from μ’s! Lanzhu watches at least 10 videos as a routine each night before bed!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? Which songs!? Also, I’m curious about the rest of your routine~! Tell me, Lanzhu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
